4401.title: Rock-Solid Boulder Badge
4401.description: Defeat Brock and earn the Boulder Badge in Pewter City.
4401.author: dude1286

4402.title: Raindrop Cascade Badge
4402.description: Defeat Misty and earn the Cascade Badge in Cerulean City.
4402.author: dude1286

4403.title: Sunny Thunder Badge
4403.description: Defeat Lt. Surge and earn the Thunder Badge in Vermilion City.
4403.author: dude1286

4404.title: Floral Rainbow Badge
4404.description: Defeat Erika and earn the Rainbow Badge in Celadon City.
4404.author: dude1286

4405.title: Heart and Soul Badge
4405.description: Defeat Koga and earn the Soul Badge in Fuchsia City.
4405.author: dude1286

4406.title: Golden Marsh Badge
4406.description: Defeat Sabrina and earn the Marsh Badge in Saffron City.
4406.author: dude1286

4407.title: Fiery Volcano Badge
4407.description: Defeat Blaine and earn the Volcano Badge at Cinnabar Island.
4407.author: dude1286

4408.title: Feathered Earth Badge
4408.description: Defeat Giovanni and earn the Earth Badge in Viridian City.
4408.author: dude1286

4409.title: Preparing to Be the Very Best
4409.description: Assemble a full team of Pokémon.
4409.author: dude1286

4410.title: Pokémon Master!
4410.description: Beat the Elite Four and the Champion of the Pokémon League.
4410.author: dude1286

4411.title: Halfway (Solo)
4411.description: Get the Pokémon in Slot 1 from Level 49 to Level 50.
4411.author: dude1286

4412.title: Halfway (Party)
4412.description: In a party of five Pokémon of level 50 or greater, get your final Pokémon to level 50.
4412.author: dude1286

4414.title: Only Take One
4414.description: Choose the Helix Fossil or the Dome Fossil at the end of Mt. Moon.
4414.author: dude1286

4416.title: Enter the Dragon
4416.description: Claim your prize from the Saffron City Dojo.
4416.author: dude1286

4418.title: GHOST!?
4418.description: Save Mr. Fuji and obtain the Poké Flute.
4418.author: dude1286

4419.title: The Sleeper Awakens
4419.description: Use the Poké Flute to awaken and catch a Snorlax.
4419.author: dude1286

4422.title: Elite Stomp
4422.description: Without resetting, beat the Pokémon League with only one Pokémon in your party; it cannot be Mew or Mewtwo.
4422.author: dude1286

4425.title: Gotta Catch 'em All
4425.description: Catch all 124 Pokémon that are available in Red Version without outside trading and without acquiring any other Pokémon through any method.
4425.author: dude1286

108020.title: Free Points
108020.description: Get a free sample courtesy of the Viridian City Pokémon Mart.
108020.author: Blazekickn

108021.title: The United Cities of Kanto
108021.description: Obtain a map of the Kanto region.
108021.author: Blazekickn

108023.title: Parting Gift
108023.description: Obtain 5 Poké Balls from Prof. Oak.
108023.author: Blazekickn

108024.title: Setting the Forest Ablaze
108024.description: Find every item and defeat every trainer in Viridian Forest.
108024.author: Blazekickn

108025.title: Shoot for the Moon
108025.description: Find every item and defeat every trainer in Mt. Moon.
108025.author: Blazekickn

108026.title: Anybody Home?
108026.description: Without resetting, and without using Repels or Cut, get from one entrance of Viridian Forest to the other without initiating any wild encounters.
108026.author: Blazekickn

108027.title: Metal Detector
108027.description: Obtain the Itemfinder from Prof. Oak's aide on Route 11.
108027.author: Blazekickn

108028.title: Flashing Lights Warning
108028.description: Obtain HM05 Flash from Prof. Oak's aide on Route 2.
108028.author: Blazekickn

108029.title: My Heart Will Go On
108029.description: Collect every optional item and defeat every optional trainer on the S.S. Anne.
108029.author: Blazekickn

108030.title: A Boatload of Fun
108030.description: Rub the Captain's back on the S.S. Anne and obtain HM01 Cut.
108030.author: Blazekickn

108033.title: Gone Critical!
108033.description: In a single battle, land five critical hits in a row.
108033.author: Blazekickn

108034.title: Target Acquired
108034.description: In a single battle, land five one-hit KO moves in a row.
108034.author: Blazekickn

108036.title: Prepare For Liftoff
108036.description: Obtain HM02 Fly from the secret house on Route 16.
108036.author: Blazekickn

108037.title: Pleading Face
108037.description: Find all the free coins in the Celadon City Game Corner.
108037.author: Blazekickn

108038.title: Ghost Buster
108038.description: Obtain the Silph Scope from the Rocket Hideout.
108038.author: Blazekickn

108039.title: Raiding the Vault
108039.description: Find every item and defeat every trainer in the Rocket Hideout.
108039.author: Blazekickn

108040.title: Dearly Beloved
108040.description: Gift the Ghost at the top of Lavender Tower a Poké Doll to calm it without using the Silph Scope.
108040.author: Blazekickn

108041.title: Grave Robbing
108041.description: Find every item and defeat every trainer in the Pokémon Tower.
108041.author: Blazekickn

108042.title: Stalemate
108042.description: Enter a battle with full HP and survive 20 turns without switching out or having either Pokémon take damage.
108042.author: Blazekickn

108044.title: Sharing Is Caring
108044.description: Obtain an Exp. All from Prof. Oak's aide in Fuchsia City.
108044.author: Blazekickn

108045.title: No Item Left Behind
108045.description: Without resetting, collect all optional items in the Safari Zone within a single Safari Hunt.
108045.author: Blazekickn

108046.title: Too Much Water
108046.description: Obtain HM03 Surf from the Safari Zone.
108046.author: Blazekickn

108047.title: Getting Your Money's Worth
108047.description: Without resetting, catch 10 Pokémon in a single Safari Hunt.
108047.author: Blazekickn

108048.title: Performance Enhancement Disk
108048.description: Obtain HM04 Strength from the Safari Zone Warden in Fuchsia City.
108048.author: Blazekickn

108049.title: I Like to Ride It
108049.description: Obtain the Bicycle from the Bike Shop in Cerulean City.
108049.author: Blazekickn

108050.title: Biggest Balls in Kanto
108050.description: Obtain the Master Ball from the President of Silph Co.
108050.author: Blazekickn

108051.title: Hostage Situation
108051.description: Find every item, defeat every trainer, and open every door in Silph Co.
108051.author: Blazekickn

108054.title: GB Bungaku Zenshuu
108054.description: Without resetting and without leaving the building, read every journal in the Cinnabar Mansion.
108054.author: Blazekickn

108056.title: 2000 IQ Super Quiz
108056.description: Without resetting and without leaving the building, complete all of the quizzes in the Cinnabar Island Gym without fighting any trainers.
108056.author: Blazekickn

108057.title: Ace of the Maze
108057.description: Starting from the gym entrance, navigate through the Fuchsia City Gym without hitting any walls.
108057.author: Blazekickn

108058.title: Rock Smash
108058.description: Defeat Brock on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 14 at the beginning of the battle.
108058.author: Blazekickn

108059.title: Pool's Closed
108059.description: Defeat Misty on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 21 at the beginning of the battle.
108059.author: Blazekickn

108060.title: One Man Army
108060.description: Defeat Lt. Surge on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 24 at the beginning of the battle.
108060.author: Blazekickn

108061.title: Kicking Some Grass
108061.description: Defeat Erika on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 29 at the beginning of the battle.
108061.author: Blazekickn

108062.title: Ninja Gaiden
108062.description: Defeat Koga on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 43 at the beginning of the battle.
108062.author: Blazekickn

108063.title: Brawn Over Brains
108063.description: Defeat Sabrina on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 43 at the beginning of the battle.
108063.author: Blazekickn

108064.title: Monkey's Tounge
108064.description: Starting from the gym entrance, navigate through the Saffron City Gym using only 4 warps.
108064.author: Blazekickn

108065.title: Fire Fighter
108065.description: Defeat Blaine on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 47 at the beginning of the battle.
108065.author: Blazekickn

108066.title: One of a Kind
108066.description: Grab the only item in the game that is inside of a Gym.
108066.author: Blazekickn

108067.title: Spin to Lose
108067.description: Starting from the gym entrance, navigate through the Viridian City Gym without using any spin tiles.
108067.author: Blazekickn

108068.title: Blasting off Again
108068.description: Defeat Giovanni in the Viridian Gym on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 50 at the beginning of the battle.
108068.author: Blazekickn

108069.title: Ekans Dilos
108069.description: Reach the Rival in Silph Co. without defeating more than 1 trainer.
108069.author: Blazekickn

108138.title: Sleeping Giant
108138.description: Be told about a legendary Pokémon that sleeps a lot.
108138.author: Blazekickn

108139.title: Unidentified Flying Object
108139.description: Glance at a mysterious bird in the distance using the binoculars.
108139.author: Blazekickn

108140.title: Victory Lap
108140.description: Find every item and defeat every trainer in Victory Road.
108140.author: Blazekickn

108141.title: cOmPlEtElY dIfFeReNt GaMeS
108141.description: Catch all of the Pokémon exclusive to Red version.
108141.author: Blazekickn

108169.title: Brand Loyalty
108169.description: Without resetting, beat the Pokémon League with a full party of Pokémon exclusive to Red.
108169.author: Blazekickn

108170.title: Prof. Perfect
108170.description: Without resetting, beat the Pokémon League without having any Pokémon faint and without using Pokémon above level 60 at the beginning of the League.
108170.author: Blazekickn

108171.title: Smogon
108171.description: Without resetting, beat the Pokémon League on Set Mode without using items in battle and without using Pokémon above level 50 at the beginning of the League.
108171.author: Blazekickn

108172.title: Surprise Mechanics
108172.description: Use Metronome and go out with a bang!
108172.author: Blazekickn

108173.title: I Found You, Faker!
108173.description: As Ditto, use Transform on another Ditto.
108173.author: Blazekickn

108174.title: Now It Is 100 Percent Safe
108174.description: Defeat or catch every stationary Pokémon.
108174.author: Blazekickn

108175.title: Area Unknown
108175.description: Without resetting and without leaving the cave, catch one of every Pokémon available in Cerulean Cave besides Mewtwo and fishing Pokémon without using the Master Ball.
108175.author: Blazekickn

108176.title: A Fair Fight
108176.description: Catch Mewtwo without using the Master Ball.
108176.author: Blazekickn

108177.title: Have Fun
108177.description: In a single session, catch Chansey, Tauros, Kanghaskan, and Scyther in the Safari Zone.
108177.author: Blazekickn

108179.title: Second Place Isn't Bad
108179.description: Win a bar at the Celadon City Game Corner.
108179.author: Blazekickn

108180.title: 7 Grand
108180.description: Win a jackpot at the Celadon City Game Corner.
108180.author: Blazekickn

108181.title: Gambling Addict
108181.description: Without resetting and without leaving the building, win 3,000 coins from slots at the Celadon City Game Corner.
108181.author: Blazekickn

108183.title: This Is Illegal, You Know
108183.description: In a single session, buy all of the Game Corner Pokémon.
108183.author: Blazekickn

108362.title: Where's My Ribbon?
108362.description: Max out a Pokémon's Stat Experience.
108362.author: Blazekickn

108364.title: I Was Frozen Today
108364.description: Be cured of being Frozen in battle without using an item in that battle.
108364.author: Blazekickn

108365.title: Disk Collector
108365.description: Find all 50 unmissable TMs and HMs on the overworld.
108365.author: Blazekickn

108366.title: Disk Buyer
108366.description: In a single session, buy 1 of every TM possible from the Department Store and Game Corner.
108366.author: Blazekickn

108367.title: Living Itemfinder
108367.description: Find all unmissable items, including hidden items, on the overworld.
108367.author: Blazekickn

108368.title: Genocide Route
108368.description: Defeat all unmissable trainers in the Kanto region.
108368.author: Blazekickn
